_description: Lot Genius optimizer configuration with comprehensive parameters
_documentation: See docs/backend/roi.md for detailed parameter explanations
_risk_threshold_comment: Confidence level for ROI constraint (80% probability). Range: 0.5-1.0
_sims_comment: Monte Carlo simulation count. More sims = higher accuracy, longer runtime
_payment_fee_comment: Payment processing fee (2.9% typical for PayPal/Stripe)
_return_rate_comment: Expected return rate (8% typical for used items)
_salvage_comment: Salvage value as fraction of estimated price for unsold items
_lot_fixed_cost_comment: Fixed costs beyond bid (inspection, transport, etc.)
_min_cash_60d_comment: Optional: Minimum expected cash recovery within horizon
_min_cash_60d_p5_comment: Optional: Minimum P5 cash recovery (VaR constraint)
_manifest_risk_comment: Discount factor for manifest uncertainty (0.95 = 5% discount)
_ops_storage_comment: Daily storage cost per item while unsold
_payout_lag_comment: Days from sale to cash receipt (affects cash flow timing)
_calibration_comment: Optional: Enable prediction logging for calibration analysis

conservative_profile._note: High certainty, lower returns, cash protection

aggressive_profile._note: Higher returns, accept more risk, conservative salvage

books_specific._note: Lower costs but poor salvage value for books
